desc: Medicase is an Australian designed case to safely and hygienically house a children's travel size medicine bottle of your popular and generic branded medicine, syringe or dropper, and teething gel.

layout.text:
We are very excited to launch our brand new product Medicase!
Are you sick of carrying around your baby’s medicine and teething gel in a zip lock bag?
Are you always losing the syringe and having sticky spills through your nappy bag?
Then get your Medicase TODAY!
